item.title: Tidy Tuesday
item.description: First #TidyTuesday contribution for the year, still have a lot to catch up on clearly. I made a leaflet map from a blog post on https://t.co/wTAS19lPLv . Stuck at sharing the interactive html file for now. Code: https://t.co/2inpMWZfuB pic.twitter.com/e6SIl02Z8M — Professional Griefer (@PipeFunction) January 30, 2020 Perfect timing for @dataandme's tweet...I decided to use {reactable} for this week's #TidyTuesday challenge. Showing average bird rating against number of votes.
